original: Pariyāpannaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: pariyāpannam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na apariyāpannaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Apariyāpannaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: apariyāpannam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na apariyāpannaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Pariyāpannaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ dve paccayavasena.)
analyzed: pariyāpannam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na apariyāpannaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka abyākata mūlam dve paccaya vasena
